home.title: Home
home.description: Discover my portfolio and have fun testing it :)

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: Curious to see the evolution of the portfolio? It's this way !

0.0:
- Creation and lauching of the portfolio with HTML/CSS/JS 
 - Use LESS

1.0:
Dynamization of the website: 
 - Using PHP 5.6 & MySQL 
 - Creation of back-office

2.0:
Back-office overhaul: 
 - Security enhancement 
 - new design 
 - Improved upload system for images
2.2:
- Bugs fixes 
 - Migration to a Progressive Web App

0.0:
The website overhaul:  
 - Use Symfony 4.1 
 - End of support for Internet Explorer and older versions of browsers 
 - Clean code 
 - Removed several javascript and css dependencies 
 - Switch LESS to SCSS 
 - Update to PHP 7.2 
 - Added webp format for images 
 - Bugs fixes 
 - Added dark mode 
 - Use of cookies for a better experience 
 - Disabling Service Workers
0.1:
- Update Symfony 4.2 
 - New ‚ÄúContact‚Äù page 
 - Switch to Recaptcha 3

1.0:
JavaScript overhaul : 
 - Removing Jquery 
 - Performance improvement 
 - Update dependencies 

 Other : 
 - Improved Firefox support 
 - Bugs fixes
1.1:
- Updated and improved administration security 
 - Update to PHP 7.3 
 - Bugs fixes
1.2: - Creation and automatic generation of the sitemap of the website
1.5:
- Update to Symfony 4.4 
 - Update to PHP 7.4 
 - Update dependencies
1.6:
- Added lazy loading for images 
 - Update dependencies

0.0:
The website overhaul: 
 - Use Nuxt 3 
 - English support 
 - Serverless Architecture

PAbout.text1: Hello, my name is Erwan Jugand and I am a passionate Front-End developer and sensitive to good practices.
PAbout.text2: My experience at Digital Campus and at Steeple helped me to refine my sensibility on design, project management, UX/UI and management.
PAbout.text3: The job of Front-End developer is a job in constant evolution, always offering more tools to design ever more efficient wesites.
PAbout.text4: I am also passionate about IT, new technologies and above all curious üòâ!
PAbout.title: About

steepleLeadFrontEndDev.title: Lead Front-End developer
steepleLeadFrontEndDev.description:
Missions in addition to those of developer: 
 - Managing the team 
 - Growing each developer 
 - Structure the pole

steepleFrontEndDev.title: Front-End developer
steepleFrontEndDev.description:
Missions: 
 - Redesign and continuous update of the website 
 - Maintenance of the Android application and the Chrome application 
 - Design of web interfaces on Adobe XD 
 - Creation and maintenance of Wordpress 
 - User tests 

 Languages used: Nuxt.js based on Vue.js, TypeScript, SASS

steepleWebIntegrator.title: Web Integrator
steepleWebIntegrator.description:
Missions : 
 - Web integration 
 - Design of web interfaces on Adobe XD 
 - Project management 
 - Media Optimization 
 - IE 11 support 

 Languages used: Ruby and Rails, HTML, SCSS

vinciWebIntegrator.title: Web Integrator
vinciWebIntegrator.description:
Missions: 
 - Audit of company websites in the VEFTGO group 
 - Inventory of existing content 
 - Migration of existing sites to WordPress 
 - Bugs reporting to the IT Department

lpcWebIntegrator.title: Web Integrator
lpcWebIntegrator.description:
Missions: 
 - Creation of the website specializing in home automation affiliation 
 - Website developped on Wordpress 

 Languages used: PHP, HTML, LESS
